short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart username generator with themes, custom words, numbers, special characters, generation history, and real-time updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to the struggle of finding the perfect username! Namlet helps you create unique, personalized usernames that are less likely to be taken on any platform, whether for gaming, social media, or more—all with just a few clicks.

Features
✔ Select from Futuristic, Meme, Anime, Medieval, and more themes to align with your personality or needs.
✔ Generate usernames with context-aware suffixes/prefixes like ItsMiya, AdamOfficial, ElonWasHere, Bella.tv, and countless more by typing a custom word and enabling Smart Extensions.
✔ Toggle numbers, special characters, or capitalization in real-time, without losing your original username base.
✔ Adjust length to create short fictional words, medium random combos, or long, multi-word usernames.
✔ Track your last 30 copied usernames in the log, view them anytime, and export to CSV for easy reference or sharing.

How It Works
1. Pick a theme and start generating.
2. Enter a custom word for personalization (optional).
3. Enable Smart Extensions for advanced prefixes/suffixes (optional).
4. Adjust length, numbers, characters, and capitalization.
5. Copy usernames to save in History or export as a CSV anytime.
Note: Themes are disabled for short-length or Smart Extensions as they don’t apply.

Why Namlet?
- Privacy-first with no data sent or stored externally
- Minimal and free with no ads or hidden fees
- Simple UI that quickly generates unique usernames

About Me
I’m an indie creator making tools I personally need. If Namlet makes life easier for you, you can support me via the in-app “Donate” button.
Have suggestions or questions? Contact support@pax.red

Disclaimer
⚠ Generated usernames are created randomly based on user inputs and algorithmic logic. The developer is not responsible for any unintended combinations.

✔ Enhanced Tooltips: Hover over length settings (Short/Medium/Long) for quick tips.
✔ UI Updates: Improved design for better usability and consistency.
✔ Expanded Word Database: Added more words for greater variety.
